title: Greek lamb stew
ingredients: ['1.4kg boneless lamb leg or shoulder', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '4 onions, chopped', '4 garlic cloves, chopped', '800g passata', '150g tomato puree', '250ml dry red wine', '75g currants, rinsed in warm water', '2 teaspoons brown sugar', '1 1/2 teaspoons ground cumin', '1 teaspoon orange zest', '2 bay leaves', '5cm cinnamon stick', '15g chopped fresh parsley', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste']
